attributes.action: Relax to UK firearms laws to allow British adults to carry a firearm.
attributes.additional_details: The government has completely lost control of its borders, and the vast majority of people coming into the country are completely un-vetted. While many of the people entering the UK may be peaceful, it is inevitable that hundreds will be here to cause hate and terror. This situation will only get worse over the coming months. The Police and Intelligence Services has proven completely ineffective at preventing these type of events.
attributes.background: Relax the UK firearms laws to allow all non-convicted adults to carry a firearm, to protect themselves, and others, against future terror attacks.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Allow UK citizens licences to carry firearms & other weapons for self-defence
